title: Fierce Coffin - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Cultivation   Demons   Male Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Poor to Rich   Underestimated Protagonist
author: 零度
description: Things all originated from a coffin floating in the river ... I thought it was a sign of heaven's prosperity, but unexpectedly it was a sign of our doom. After prying open the coffin, I began to feel that an unclean thing followed me to my house and my daughter changed. It became more and more strange that she started to develop at the age of three!>
